cosmos-desc: Cosmos is a skin designed and based off Fandom's Oasis skin. Designed to improve upon their design, and provide an efficient MediaWiki skin for non-Fandom users, or for users transitioning out of Fandom.
cosmos-createpage-text: We currently have '''$1''' {{PLURAL:$1|article|articles}} on $2. Type your article name above $3
cosmos-createpage-wanted-pages: or click on one of the titles below and start writing!
cosmos-createpage-no-wanted-pages: or create one of the articles listed [[$1|here]]!
cosmos-mobile-preference: Enable mobile responsive version of the Cosmos skin
cosmos-themedesigner-help-1: Background color of the personal navigation banner.
cosmos-themedesigner-help-2: Background color of the wiki navigation header.
cosmos-themedesigner-help-4: Background color of main content area.
cosmos-themedesigner-help-10: Background image of the wiki navigation header.
cosmos.css: /* All CSS here will be loaded for users of the Cosmos skin */
cosmos.js: /* All JavaScript here will be loaded for users of the Cosmos skin */
